subject: Suits and Litigation
Madison Square Garden
Sexual Harassment
Basketball
lead_paragraph: A after Madison Square Garden Chairman James L. Dolan said that he fired Anucha Browne Sanders without talking to her supervisor, lawyers for Knicks Coach Isiah Thomas were to begin their defense case.
snippet: A after Madison Square Garden Chairman James L. Dolan said that he fired Anucha Browne Sanders without talking to her supervisor, lawyers for Knicks Coach Isiah Thomas were to begin their defense case.
